titles.title: Hidden Rate Elimination Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide individual income tax rate reductions and to repeal the phaseouts of the deduction for personal exemptions and of itemized deductions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/6/2001--Introduced. Hidden Rate Elimination Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for a reduction in tax rates for individuals for calendar year 2002, as well as further reductions through calendar year 2006.Repeals the phaseout of personal exemptions.Repeals the overall limitation on itemized deductions.
